Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.io

  • Packages that use org.jgrapes.io 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.http
    Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
    org.jgrapes.http.freemarker
    Provides a base component for generating template based responses to HTTP requests.
    org.jgrapes.io
    I/O related components built on top of the core package.
    org.jgrapes.io.events
    Provides the events used by the I/O related components.
    org.jgrapes.io.util
    Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.
    org.jgrapes.net
    Networking related I/O classes.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.http 
    Class Description
    IOSubchannel
    Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.http.freemarker 
    Class Description
    IOSubchannel
    Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.io 
    Class Description
    InputStreamMonitor
    A component that watches for new input on an InputStream.
    IOSubchannel
    Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.io.events 
    Class Description
    NioHandler
    Defines the contract between a component using non blocking I/O and the NioDispatcher.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.io.util 
    Class Description
    IOSubchannel
    Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
    IOSubchannel.DefaultIOSubchannel
    A simple implementation of IOSubchannel.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io used by org.jgrapes.net 
    Class Description
    IOSubchannel
    Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
    IOSubchannel.DefaultIOSubchannel
    A simple implementation of IOSubchannel.
    NioHandler
    Defines the contract between a component using non blocking I/O and the NioDispatcher.
